subject: Basketball
Murders and Attempted Murders
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tyreke Evans, considered by many to be the top high-school basketball player in the country, has three older brothers acting as sentinels, but can that protection ever be enough?
snippet: Tyreke Evans, considered by many to be the top high-school basketball player in the country, has three older brothers acting as sentinels, but can that protection ever be enough?
